description.narrative:
Sunpreme Ltd. (the Company) is a global photovoltaic (PV) solar start-up company, based in Cayman Islands, engaged in the business of developing and commercializing its proprietary SmartSilicon® based solar cells to satisfy growing global needs for low-cost, high efficiency clean energy.
The Company is raising up to $60 million to scale up manufacturing and R&D facilities globally, including China, other parts of Asia and Latin America. Initially, the Company will be setting up a 30MW initial production capacity in Jiaxing, China, and build additional production facilities in other markets globally (the Project). The financing will be deployed towards capital equipment expansion, building out R&D capacity, working capital and set up facilities and partnership agreements in key markets in Latin America, Asia and other geographies.

The Project will contribute to the transfer of technologies in the solar sectors to key emerging markets such as Latin America, Sub-Saharan Africa, China and India by combining the high technology innovation in the Company's US facilities, with the lower manufacturing base and target user markets in developing countries. By supporting a technology innovator that focuses on reducing cost/watt at the module level and supplying modules to the large manufacturers, the Project will support the solar sector in its aim to reduce its cost to close to grid parity levels in key markets. In addition, the Company's green technology process sequence avoids toxic and/or exotic materials, aiming to eliminate the paradox of exporting clean technology globally while polluting the environment locally.

name.narrative: Sunpreme has existing R&D facilities in Sunnyvale, CA and in Nanhui, China. The Project will initially be built out in Jiaxing China, a small town about 100 km from Shanghai, where Sunpreme will set up a 30 MW production facility. In addition to China, the Company will establish operations or JVs in markets such as Brazil, Sub-Saharan Africa and India amongst others.
